name: VelociRush Time Trials
description:
Now on Kickstarter Kickstarter completed and successful. 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/velocirush/velocrirush-drone-racing-for-the...

Finally, take the thrill of drone racing into your pocket with the most anticipated Drone racing game on the Gameboy this millennia...VelociRush Time trials

Demo now available. Best enjoyed on original hardware!!

Full game has 27 courses across 3 themed locations. Each with a 1st 2nd and 3rd place time to beat and get your name on the scoreboard. Add with that once you qualify, you unlock the ultimate power of 6s and really rip the track with much faster action. Full in game training to ensure you know how to fly the tracks! 

Demo includes training levels and a 4s and a 6s tracks in each theme. 

Massive update to include 8 way directional controls.
